global.sorry_cant_show: Sorry, I can't show you any proposals right now.
global.its_probably: It's probably because there are not any matching your criteria.

wallet_index.title: Hive wallet login
wallet_index.content: Welcome to Hive's official Hive blockchain wallet. Use it to transfer Hive tokens, Power up, vote for Hive Witnesses and change your Hive profile details.

profil.hive_description: Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime. Hive can be converted to HIVE POWER in a process called powering up.
profil.hp_description: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards. Part of {{username}}'s HIVE POWER is currently delegated. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on Hive. Your delegation amount can fluctuate. HIVE POWER increases at an APR of approximately {{value}}%, subject to blockchain variance.
profil.hive_dolar_description: Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
profil.savings_description: Balances subject to 3 day withdraw waiting period. HBD interest rate: 20.00% APR (as voted by the
profil.estimated_account_value_description: The estimated value is based on an average value of Hive in US dollars.
profil.the_next_power_down: The next power down is scheduled to happen in
profil.account_history_description: Beware of spam and phishing links in transfer memos. Do not open links from users you do not trust. Do not provide your private keys to any third party websites. Transactions will not show until they are confirmed on the blockchain, which may take a few minutes.

witnesses_page.title: Witness Voting
witnesses_page.you_can_vote_for_maximum_of_witnesses: You can vote for a maximum of 30 witnesses
witnesses_page.witness_list_notes: Notes: in the list below, the first 100 witnesses are unfiltered, this includes active and inactive witnesses. Past the rank of 100, witnesses will be filtered out of the list if they have not produced any block for the last 30 days.
witnesses_page.vote_description: If you would like to vote for a witness outside of the top 200, enter the account name below to cast a vote.
witnesses_page.proxy_description: You can also choose a proxy that will vote for witnesses for you. This will reset your current witness selection.
witnesses_page.use_this_for_linking_title: Use this for linking to this page and highlight the selected witness
witnesses_page.has_not_produced_blocks: ⚠️Has not produced any blocks for over a week.

proxy_form.title: Confirm Account Witness Proxy
proxy_form.description: You are about to remove your proxy.

login_form.this_operation_requires_your_key_or_mast: This operation requires your {{authType}} key or Master password.

change_password_page.understand_that: I understand that Hive cannot recover lost passwords
change_password_page.i_saved_password: I have securely saved my generated password
change_password_page.backup_password_by_storing_it: Back it up by storing in your password manager or a text file

the_rules.one: The first rule of Hive is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules.second: The second rule of Hive is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules.third: The third rule of Hive is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

four_oh_four.this_page_does_not_exist: Sorry! This page does not exist.
four_oh_four.not_to_worry: Not to worry. You can head back to

authorities_page.account_exists_error: This account or key already exists in the list

transfers_page.financial_report_description: Use this to generate a CSV file containing financial transactions from your history within the selected date range. Depending on how active your account is, it might take a little while to complete.

error.account_length_min: Account name is too short. Use at least 3 characters.
error.account_length_max: Account name is too long. Use max 16 characters.

transfers_page.power_up_info: Converted HIVE POWER can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to HIVE.
transfers_page.bad_actors_info: Use caution sending to this account. Please double check your spelling for possible phishing.
transfers_page.transfer_to_account_desc: Move funds to another Hive account.
transfers_page.transfer_to_desc: Protect funds by requiring a 3 day withdraw waiting period.
transfers_page.power_up_desc: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards. HIVE POWER is non-transferable and requires 3 months (13 payments) to convert back to HIVE.
transfers_page.savings_withdraw_desc: Withdraw funds after the required 3 day waiting period.

permissions.any_password: Any password or key is more likely to get compromised the more it is used. That's why Hive uses a hierarchical key system to keep you safe. You are issued with four keys which have different permissions. For example, the Posting Key (which is intended to be used frequently) has a limited set of permissions for social actions that require less security. You'll need to be more careful with your Active Key since it has permissions to perform wallet related actions
permissions.note: Please take note of your Hive Keys listed below. Ideally, use a Password Manager (like 1Password or LastPass) or store an offline copy safely (on a piece of paper or on a file on a USB drive).

posting_key.name: Posting Key
posting_key.info: This key should be used for social networking actions, like posting, commenting and voting. This key has a limited set of permissions and it is not able to be used for monetary actions. So you can't lose money if someone else gets access to this key.
posting_key.use: Use this key to log in to other Hive-powered social networks like Hive.blog, Busy and Esteem. Store this key safely.

active_key.name: Active Key
active_key.info: This key has additional permissions for more sensitive monetary-related actions, like transferring and exchanging tokens.
active_key.use: When performing a wallet related action, you may be prompted to authenticate with your Active key. You should only enter your Active Key into apps which you trust because anyone with access to this key can take your tokens. Do yourself a favor and store this key safely to avoid losing tokens in the future.
active_key.place_order: Place an order on an exchange

owner_key.name: Owner Key
owner_key.info: The owner key is required to change the other keys. This key has additional permissions to recover your account or change your other keys. It's the most important key and should be securely stored offline.
owner_key.reset: Reset Owner, Active, and Posting keys

memo_key.name: Memo Key
memo_key.info: The Memo key because it is a bit of an outlier. The only thing the Memo Key can do is encrypt and decrypt private messages that are sent through the blockchain. While this could one day be a powerful feature, today it is not commonly used. If you have received a private message that you would like to decrypt, as always you should use the key with the minimum necessary authorities, which in this case would be the Memo Key.

permissions.public_info: Each Hive Key has a public and private key to encrypt and decrypt data. Public keys are associated with usernames and can be used to look up associated transactions on the blockchain. Your public keys are not required for login on Hive.blog and you don't need to store these safely.
permissions.view_public: View public key information for this account (in the 'Authorities' module):
